channel.title: ::mypos
channel.description: Well, I was using the 614 pking client, and I log in today and notice a few things. But mainly, I can't do ::mypos I would like to set the new home. Also, if I downloaded this and someone else was already the "Owner" how may I change that? I deleted their Character Files, my Power=3 and =4 is nothing, so anyone know? I have some more questions, but I want to get the basics done with first.

item.title: ::mypos
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Find the commands class and edit it to your needs.

Read full topic

item.title: ::mypos
item.dc:creator: @Speakmore Speakmore
item.description:
@Speakmore wrote:

Okay, so you say I make no sense…
Let me start over
I needed my position so I could set it as the home.
I log into my account and it has Power=3 which in this case is owner
However, I am not considered the owner of the server as I

  1. can’t use ::mypos
  2. doesn’t say I am

For part 2, when I downloaded the client and source, people already coded stuff and tested, so their characters had owner and admin etc. I want to change that so my character is the owner and get my pos…

I just wanted this so I could change where I spawn at when I make a new account, or whenever someone does.

Read full topic

item.title: ::mypos
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

You made no sense, What?

& 3 is ‘owner’

Read full topic

item.title: ::mypos
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Player rights 2 is owner

Read full topic

item.title: ::mypos
item.dc:creator: @Speakmore Speakmore
item.description:
@Speakmore wrote:

Well, that wasn’t the problem. The problem apparently was that I needed to be on the owners account to be able to check ::mypos

I made my characters Rights 3, yet it still says he is the owner. Can anyone help me with that?

Read full topic

item.title: ::mypos
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

void loadCommands() { if (Command().equals("myposition")) { client.getActionAssistant().sendMessage("X: " + client.getPlayer().playerPosX()); client.getActionAssistant().sendMessage("Y: " + client.getPlayer().playerPosY()); } }

This won’t work, but it give you an idea, maybe?

Read full topic

item.title: ::mypos

item.description:
@Speakmore wrote:

Well, I was using the 614 pking client, and I log in today and notice a few things. But mainly, I can’t do ::mypos
I would like to set the new home.
Also, if I downloaded this and someone else was already the “Owner” how may I change that? I deleted their Character Files, my Power=3 and =4 is nothing, so anyone know?
I have some more questions, but I want to get the basics done with first.

Read full topic
